text.text_translated:
Horror films often use empty places.
For example, an old hospital.
Or a scary, empty house.
Or a town with no people.
These empty places are very scary.
You think about the past.
What was it like when people lived there?
Why did they go away?
These places are also very quiet.
This can be scary too.
Empty places are also good for film makers.
It is easy to believe your phone will not work there.
